When a writer from Dublin learns to knit, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her arch enemy breaks somebody's leg. However, the writer finds change too difficult and goes back to being dissatisfied and grumpy.

When a tutor from Sugar Land develops a fear of cockerels, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his tutor buys a record company. However, the tutor finds change too difficult and goes back to being dissatisfied and grumpy.
Jana is a lawyer from Austria who falls in love with her tutor. The two are separated when the tutor falls for somebody else. Jana turns to drugs then accidentally overdoes and dies.

Karl is a killer fuelled by jealousy, who squishes nurses and writes about it. Mr Dixon, a philanthropist from Richmond, knows she has to stop him. The villian inspires multiple copycats across the globe, and the death count continues to rise, exponentially.

A virgin from Riga is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of a pie eating contest. However, his chances are scuppered when his grandmother is badly injured in a car accident. Unfortunately, the billionaire misses the event and vows never to try at anything ever again.

Luca is a virgin from Memphis who falls in love with his step-sister. The two are separated when the step-sister catches the flu and has to stay in hospital where she makes new friends. Luca turns to food and becomes enormous then he accidentally falls on his step-sister, crushing her.

1Maxim is a killer fuelled by lust, who stalks nurses and photographs his victims' lips. DCI Schuster, a pilot from Istanbul, knows she has to stop him. The villian inspires multiple copycats across the globe, and the death count continues to rise, exponentially.

When a politician from St Albans learns to play guitar, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her arch enemy slices the head off an enemy. After achieving her goal, the politician turns to gambling then is killed by mobsters.
Jayde is a killer fuelled by lust, who watches doctors and shaves them. Mr Stanton, a professor from Bellevue, knows she has to stop her. In a brutal conclusion, the villain murders Stanton's cousin.
In a world where women are stand-up comedians, one orphan has no choice but to destroy the earth by becoming a world leader. Despite the orphan's best efforts, the world ends and everybody dies.

Sherrod is a giant fuelled by lust, who watches teenagers and dyes their heads green. Mrs Fullick, a teacher from Greenville, knows she has to stop him. The villian inspires multiple copycats across the globe, and the death count continues to rise, exponentially.
The hero is a fairy from Milton who is particularly good at magic. The nemesis is a fairy who tells innapropriate jokes. The nemesis gets the upper hand by playing a dirty trick.

When an actor from Westminster learns to knit, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her gardener gets him a gig at a local theatre. However, the actor finds change too difficult and goes back to being dissatisfied and grumpy.

A professor from Topeka is delighted when she gets the chance to take part in the final of a pie eating contest. However, her chances are scuppered when her grandfather is badly injured in a car accident. Distraught at losing a pie eating contest, the professor packers herself off to the mountains and beomes a hermit.
The hero is a fairy from Jacksonville who has a partcilar set of skills. The nemesis is a fairy who plots an evil scheme. The nemesis gets the upper hand and kills the hero.
The hero is a prince from Gainesville who is particularly good at magic. The nemesis is a prince who has a smelly bottom. The nemesis gets the upper hand and destroys the world.

twist: A sailor from Washington is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of Britain's Got Talent. However, his chances are scuppered when he finds he doesn't have enough money for the train fare. the sailor remembers that he is actually last year's winner, but has amnesia.

A soldier from Naperville is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of X-Factor. However, his chances are scuppered when his great aunt is badly injured in a car accident. Unexpectedly, the soldier is bitten by a zombie and therefore is disqualified from competing.

A professor from Aurora is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of a dancing competition. However, his chances are scuppered when his breakfast is spiked. Unexpectedly, the professor is bitten by a zombie and therefore is disqualified from competing.

In a world where monkeys outnumber every other creature, one athlete has no choice but to release a pop song by becoming a world leader. It turns out the killer has been in jail all along, and is writing a story about an alternative life.

When a personal trainer from Ashburn develops a fear of blood, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his tutor becomes a politician. It turns out they were teddy bears all along.
In a world where zombies are starving, one wizard has no choice but to find a crime-fighting sidekick using an ancient scroll. It turns out they're all just action figures.

A virgin from Goose Creek is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of a talent show. However, his chances are scuppered when he is kidnapped. It turns our the virgin has been dead all along.

When an electrician from Istanbul learns the secret to world peace, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his teacher find a misplaced key. It turns out that they were beetles all along.

A geriatric from Philadelphia is delighted when she gets the chance to take part in the final of a dancing competition. However, her chances are scuppered when her car breaks down on the way to the competition. the geriatric realises she's actually a ghost.
In a world where women are warriors, one writer has no choice but to leave facebook using just her mind. It turns out the entire plot has been in the writer's imagination.
Shanley is an acrobat from Tacoma who falls in love with her best friend. The two are separated when the best friend goes away to sea. It turns out her best friend is simply an action figure.
The hero is a fairy from Blacksburg who has a particular interest in dinner. The nemesis is a fairy who plots an evil scheme. It turns out the hero is just a toy.

A solicitor from Jeddah is delighted when she gets the chance to take part in the final of X-Factor. However, her chances are scuppered when she is kidnapped. the solicitor realises she's actually a ghost.

A cleaner from Albuquerque is delighted when she gets the chance to take part in the final of Britain's Got Talent. However, her chances are scuppered when her mother goes missing. It turns out the competition is just a delusion and actually the cleaner has no talent.
In a world where women have infiltrated the government, one dancer has no choice but to bring down the goverment using just her mind. It turns out that the dancer is a zombie.

Gilli is a killer from Australia who falls in love with her step-brother. The two are separated when the step-brother decides the relationship is inappropriate. It turns out the entire plot has been in Gilli's imagination.
The hero is a pixie from Garland who has a particular interest in supper. The nemesis is a pixie who uses too many plastic bags. It turns out the hero and the nemesis are the same person.

When a nurse from Rome decides to go into space, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his arch enemy writes to the papers. It turns out the entire plot has been in the nurse's imagination.

In a world where women run large corporations, one Jedi has no choice but to find another planet to colonise by eating his own great uncle. It turns out the killer founded the federation of dangerous women.
The hero is a pixie from Vancouver who can turn anybody into a puma. The nemesis is a pixie who threatens humanity. It turns out it was all a dream.

A student from Turku is delighted when she gets the chance to take part in the final of a talent show. However, her chances are scuppered when she finds she doesn't have enough money for the train fare. It turns out the entire plot has been in the student's imagination.

When a fire fighter from Rome develops a fear of cockerels, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her arch enemy buys a record company. The fire fighter remembers that she actually killed her arch enemy ten years previous.

An author from Whitby is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of a singing competition. However, his chances are scuppered when he finds out his arch rival is also going to compete. It turns out the entire plot has been in the author's imagination.

A waiter from Sunderland is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of a singing competition. However, his chances are scuppered when his son goes missing. It turns out the competition is just a delusion and actually the waiter has no talent.

An electrician from Exeter is delighted when she gets the chance to take part in the final of Bake Off. However, her chances are scuppered when she is kidnapped. It turns out the entire plot has been in the electrician's imagination.

In a world where apes make the rules, one tutor has no choice but to assasinate an honorable man by eating his own father. It turns out the whole plot was a practical joke played by the tutor's hilarious father.

In a world where robots run large corporations, one cowgirl has no choice but to bring down the goverment by eating her own daughter. It turns out the whole plot was a practical joke played by the cowgirl's hilarious daughter.

When a psychologist from Thailand learns to make tissue paper flowers, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her teacher recovers from cancer. It turns out the psychologist is 200 years old but living off a life potion.
Natalie is a doctor from Turkey who falls in love with her arch enemy. The two are separated when the arch enemy gets a horrifying tattoo. It turns our Natalie has been dead all along.
The hero is a prince from Germany who is particularly good at magic. The nemesis is a prince who eats goldfish. It turns out the hero is really a ghost.

When a farmer from Garland learns to play guitar, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his teacher slices the head off an enemy. It turns out the whole plot was a practical joke.
When a girl from York learns to sword fight, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her golf caddy meets a train robber. It turns out the girl is aging backwards.

When a student from Windsor learns to make tissue paper flowers, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her teacher becomes a vet. It turns out the student is aging backwards.

Zehavit is a monster fuelled by greed, who murders teenagers and writes about it. Doctor Larkspur, a teacher from Wolverhampton, knows she has to stop him. Larkspur remembers that she actually killed the villian ten years previous and is suffering from flashbacks.

In a world where zombies make the rules, one sherif has no choice but to assasinate an honorable man using an old diary. It turns out all the zombies were a manifestations of the sherif's multiple personality disorder and his real fight is one to regain sanity.

Guillermo is a monster fuelled by love, who eats teenagers and posts photos of their tongues on Facebook. DI Bolle, an electrician from Marietta, knows she has to stop him. The story ends with DI Bolle's daughter's tongues arriving in the post.
Gem is a police chief from Boulder who falls in love with her best friend. The two are separated when the best friend falls for somebody else. It turns out they were toy dolls all along.
The hero is a princess from Victoria who has a trusty parrot sidekick. The nemesis is a princess who makes up nasty stories. It turns out the hero and the nemesis are the same person.

The hero is a princess from Bradford who is particularly good at magic. The nemesis is a princess who tells innapropriate jokes. It turns out the whole thing was a memory and the hero is on her deathbed reflecting.
The hero is a princess from Aylesbury who is destined to save the world. The nemesis is a princess who eats too much. It turns out the hero is really a ghost.
The hero is a princess from London who recieves an invitation to a battle. The nemesis is a princess who threatens humanity. It turns out the hero is just a toy.

Jenna is a monster fuelled by racism, who blows raspberries at teachers and dyes their eyeballs peach. Detective Daws, a doctor from Wokingham, knows she has to stop her. It turns out the villian and Detective Daws are the same person.

Randolph is a giant fuelled by homophobia, who tickles ants and posts photos of their eyeballs on Facebook. Detective Trigili, a farmer from Sutton, knows she has to stop him. It turns out the villian is really Trigili's great aunt.
In a world where robots are wealthy, one developer has no choice but to release a pop song by becoming a world leader. It turns out the whole story is a Star Wars franchise.

When a boy from Grand Rapids decides to become a fugitive, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his best friend finds a magic knitting needle. It turns out the boy has been in jail all along, and is writing a story about an alternative life.
The hero is a princess from Barrie who has a trusty guppy sidekick. The nemesis is a princess who tells innapropriate jokes. It turns out the hero is just a toy.
The hero is a prince from Hamilton who has a trusty giraffe sidekick. The nemesis is a prince who tells innapropriate jokes. It turns out the hero has been dead all along.
When a fairy from Clayton develops a fear of blood, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her gardener opens a zoo. The fairy realises she's actually a ghost.
In a world where apes are starving, one detective has no choice but to protect mankind by becoming a world leader. It turns out the apes are all sheep.
In a world where zombies are stand-up comedians, one engineer has no choice but to find another planet to colonise by killing his own aunt. It turns out the killer is related to Darth Vadar.
Brock is a dentist from Fayetteville who falls in love with his gardener. The two are separated when the gardener falls for somebody else. It turns out his gardener is actually Brock's reflection.

Ashwin is a developer from Germany who falls in love with his gardener. The two are separated when the gardener accidentally runs over a rabbit and becomes too distraught to love. It turns out Ashwin can travel in time, so he goes back and changes the past.

When a student from France learns to make tissue paper flowers, not everybody is supportive. However, her fortunes improve when her tutor builds a space rocket. It turns out her tutor is actually the student's reflection.
The hero is a witch from Knoxville who has a particular interest in supper. The nemesis is a witch who doesn't recycle. It turns out the hero and the nemesis are twins.
In a world where apes outnumber every other creature, one girl has no choice but to protect mankind by eating her own neice. It turns out the entire plot has been in the girl's imagination.

When a waiter from Phoenix learns to make tissue paper flowers, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his gardener finds a space travel course on the internet. It turns out they were teddy bears all along.
In a world where monkeys are rude and reckless, one orphan has no choice but to release a pop song by killing her own step-sister. It turns our the orphan has been dead all along.

A cleaner from Woodlake is delighted when he gets the chance to take part in the final of a baking competition. However, his chances are scuppered when his car breaks down on the way to the competition. the cleaner realises he's actually a ghost.
The hero is a goblin from Indonesia who is afraid of blood. The nemesis is a goblin who is exceptionally arrogant. It turns out the hero is really a dog with an overactive imagination.

Cristael is a detective from New Orleans who falls in love with her arch enemy. The two are separated when the arch enemy decides the relationship is inappropriate. It turns out the entire plot has been in Cristael's imagination.
